statements: SELECT * FROM social_media_conversations ORDER BY conversation_timestamp DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT user_id, conversation_text FROM social_media_conversations WHERE user_id = '12345'
SELECT conversation_id, conversation_text FROM social_media_conversations ORDER BY conversation_id DESC
SELECT conversation_id, user_id FROM social_media_conversations WHERE user_id = '54321' ORDER BY conversation_id
SELECT * FROM social_media_conversations WHERE conversation_timestamp > '2022-01-01'
SELECT conversation_id, user_id, conversation_text, conversation_timestamp FROM social_media_conversations WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT user_id, conversation_text FROM social_media_conversations WHERE conversation_timestamp > '2021-06-15 10:00:00';
SELECT conversation_id, conversation_text FROM social_media_conversations WHERE conversation_timestamp < '2021-05-20 08:30:00' ORDER BY conversation_timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM social_media_conversations WHERE conversation_id = '333e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174333' AND user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT conversation_id, user_id, conversation_text FROM social_media_conversations WHERE conversation_timestamp BETWEEN '2021-04-01 00:00:00' AND '2021-04-30 23:59:59';
SELECT * FROM conversations;
SELECT topic, message_text FROM conversations WHERE user_id = 'c0cdd22d-bf59-463c-8f8b-93abfb2633bb';
SELECT topic, timestamp FROM conversations ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT topic, message_text, timestamp FROM conversations WHERE topic LIKE '%important%' AND timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT DISTINCT topic_name FROM trending_topics ORDER BY relevance_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM conversations WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426655440000';
SELECT topic, message_text, timestamp FROM conversations WHERE conversation_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426655440001';
SELECT topic, timestamp FROM conversations WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426655440002' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT topic, message_text, timestamp FROM conversations ORDER BY timestamp ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT COUNT(*), topic FROM conversations GROUP BY topic HAVING COUNT(*) > 1 ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC;
SELECT * FROM conversations
SELECT conversation_id, message FROM conversations
SELECT sender_id, timestamp FROM conversations WHERE sender_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000'
SELECT * FROM conversations ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT conversation_id, sender_id, message FROM conversations WHERE sender_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000'
SELECT * FROM conversations WHERE sender_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT conversation_id, sender_id FROM conversations WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
SELECT conversation_id, message FROM conversations ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT sender_id FROM conversations;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM conversations WHERE message LIKE '%important%';
SELECT * FROM social_media_conversations
SELECT topic, customer_id, timestamp FROM social_media_conversations
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customer_profiles
SELECT * FROM trending_topics ORDER BY mentions_count DESC
SELECT feedback, sentiment FROM customer_feedback WHERE sentiment='Positive'
SELECT * FROM social_media_conversations LIMIT 5
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customer_profiles WHERE location = 'USA'
SELECT topic_name, mentions_count, last_updated FROM trending_topics ORDER BY mentions_count DESC, last_updated ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT feedback, sentiment FROM customer_feedback WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' AND timestamp <= '2022-08-31'
SELECT c.customer_name, f.feedback FROM customer_profiles c JOIN customer_feedback f ON c.customer_id = f.customer_id
SELECT * FROM social_media_conversations;
SELECT customer_id, message FROM social_media_conversations WHERE customer_id = 3;
SELECT topic_name, popularity_score FROM trending_topics ORDER BY popularity_score DESC;
SELECT feedback_id, feedback, rating FROM customer_feedback WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email, location FROM customer_details WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT * FROM social_media_conversations;
SELECT conversation_id, customer_id, message FROM social_media_conversations WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customer_details WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT topic_name, popularity_score FROM trending_topics ORDER BY popularity_score DESC;
SELECT feedback_id, feedback, rating FROM customer_feedback WHERE rating > 4;
